title: Teddy Bear
description:
A classic teddy bear, as snuggled by a child when going to sleep.

Depicted as a brown, stuffed toy bear, shown seated with its arms to the sides, hind paw pads facing forward, and a friendly smile on its face. Google, WhatsApp, and Twitter's designs include a ribbon around the neck, while Facebook's is wearing a bow tie.

Commonly used to convey something or someone is cute or cuddly (e.g., teddy bear as a term of endearment) as well as other warm, loving sentiments (e.g., get well soon). May also be used for various content concerning toys and children more generally.

Not to be confused with üêª Bear Face, though their applications may overlap.
apple_vendor_description: The teddy bear emoji on Apple devices is an embodiment of comfort and nostalgia, rendered with soft, plush textures and a gentle, approachable demeanor. Its round, friendly eyes and slightly tilted head are typical of Apple's endearing character designs, enhanced by subtle 3D shading and smooth highlights that make it look incredibly huggable. This emoji is a universally recognized symbol of childhood innocence, affection, and a sweet gesture of comfort or a friendly greeting.
